results.title: Novel Albumin Nanoparticle Enhanced the Anti-Insulin-Resistant-Hepatoma Activity of Metformin
results.text_hl: Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is an ideal candidate to treat the @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008113 @@@liver tumor@@@ with @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@.

citations.NLM: Lu Z, Qi L, Lin YR, Sun L, Zhang L, Wang GC, Li JQ, Yu JM. Novel Albumin Nanoparticle Enhanced the Anti-Insulin-Resistant-Hepatoma Activity of Metformin Int J Nanomedicine. 2020;15():5203-5215. PMID: 32801686

results.title: Metformin inhibits the development and metastasis of colorectal cancer.
results.text_hl: In @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colorectal cancer@@@ xenograft @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, the @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver metastatic@@@ rate (10% vs. 50%, p = 0.05) and the number of @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver metastatic@@@ nodules (0.1/body vs. 1.2/body, p = 0.04) were significantly lower in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group. @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@Tumor@@@ proliferation and EMT were decreased and apoptosis was promoted only in metastatic @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008113 @@@liver tumors@@@ of @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Sugiura K, Okabayashi K, Seishima R, Ishida T, Shigeta K, Tsuruta M, Hasegawa H, Kitagawa Y. Metformin inhibits the development and metastasis of colorectal cancer. Med Oncol. 2022 Jul 2;39(9):136. PMID: 35780231

results.title: Metformin treatment rescues CD8+ T-cell response to immune checkpoint inhibitor therapy in mice with NAFLD.
results.text_hl: In vivo imaging analysis showed reduced motility of intratumoural CD8+ T cells. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ treatment rescued the efficacy of anti-@GENE_PDCD1 @GENE_18566 @@@PD-1@@@ therapy against @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008113 @@@liver tumours@@@ in @DISEASE_Fatty_Liver_Alcoholic @DISEASE_MESH:D005235 @@@NASH@@@.

citations.NLM: Wabitsch S, McCallen JD, Kamenyeva O, Ruf B, McVey JC, Kabat J, Walz JS, Rotman Y, Bauer KC, Craig AJ, Pouzolles M, Phadke I, Catania V, Green BL, Fu C, Diggs LP, Heinrich B, Wang XW, Ma C, Greten TF. results.title: AMPK induces degradation of the transcriptional repressor PROX1 impairing branched amino acid metabolism and tumourigenesis
results.text_hl: Importantly, @GENE_PROX1 @GENE_5629 @@@PROX1@@@ deficiency or @VARIANT_c.202G>T_TSC2_human @VARIANT_tmVar:p|Allele|S|79;VariantGroup:1;CorrespondingGene:7249;RS#:767626323;CorrespondingSpecies:9606 @@@Ser79@@@ phosphorylation in @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008113 @@@liver tumour@@@ shows therapeutic resistance to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Metformin prevents liver tumorigenesis by inhibiting pathways driving hepatic lipogenesis.
results.text_hl: We show in these studies that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protected @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ against chemically induced @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008113 @@@liver tumors@@@.
